page.title: 08FARMING SURVEY part one
page.content: This survey has been compiled from 9 farms in the D-block area showing sizes, systems of tenures and more information concerning the farm holdings. The following pages are a summary of the information collected in the project. Of the farms surveyed in the area none had decreased their field sizes 78% had stayed the same and 22% had increased their sizes in the last ten years.The recent building of the M56 motorway(approximately ten years ago) has only affected 22% of the farmers who complain of severed land and an increase in the noise level.
